description: Defines an immutable class 'FilterCriteria' that encapsulates user preference filtering criteria including categorical (hair colors, religions, ethnicities) and range (height, weight) attributes. Provides methods for copying with modifications, equality comparison, and internal set utilities. Additionally includes a class with predefined options for UI selection.

classes.name: FilterCriteria
classes.description: An immutable data class representing user preference filter criteria, including categories and range parameters, with utility methods for copying, comparison, and hashing.

classes.name: FilterOptions
classes.description: A utility class providing predefined static lists for filter options and constants for UI range sliders.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a new instance of FilterCriteria with specified fields overridden.

methods.name: operator ==
methods.description: Overrides equality operator to compare FilterCriteria instances for value equality.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Computes a hash code for the FilterCriteria instance based on its fields.

methods.name: _setEquals
methods.description: Static utility to compare two sets of strings for equality regardless of order.

methods.name: _hashSet
methods.description: Static utility to generate an order-independent hash code for a set of strings.
